import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useLanguage } from "../LanguageSource"; import "../index.css"; import "../styles/navbar.css"; import terminal from "../img/terminal.png"; import br from "../img/br.png"; import uk from "../img/uk_.png"; const Navbar = () => { const { currentLanguage, translations } = useLanguage(); const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const toggleMenu = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); }; return (
  • {translations[currentLanguage].home}
  • {translations[currentLanguage].projects}
  • GitHub
  • LinkedIn
  • {translations[currentLanguage].getInTouch}
); }; export default Navbar;
